events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately the item is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' since the customer is requesting money back for their order.
Support agent Mark Thompson has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to assist with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reason for the return so we can process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 78945321. The item was missing parts and wasn't functioning properly, so I can't use it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send it back today.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard any further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
